text: Mariano Francisco Saynez Mendoza (20 September 1942 – 4 November 2020) was an admiral in the Mexican Navy. He was born in Veracruz, Veracruz. Saynez Mendoza was Secretary of Navy under President Felipe Calderón cabinet from 1 December 2006 to 30 November 2012. Saynez Mendoza died on 4 November 2020 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican military people Category:Mexican politicians Category:People from Veracruz
title: Mariano Francisco Saynez Mendoza
